Accreditation

The information gathered can help confirm the cause of health concerns or rule out any potential concerns which are a critical tools in helping healthcare providers understand.
Values and Culture
Meet our Leaders
Home
Metabolic reactions produce these compounds from the digestion of dietary protein, fat, and carbohydrates. The resulting organic acids are used by the body to generate cellular energy and provide many of the building blocks necessary for cell function.
DAP Certificate of Accreditation London Laboratory
Accreditation is defined as the public recognition of quality achievement by a health care organization, as demonstrated through an independent external peer comparison of the organization’s performance against current best practices.

As an industry leader, we are relentless in our pursuit of advancing the science of wellness and working with our laboratory partner to create a healthier world.
